head.supplied: 13th May [188]7 ¶ Dear Baron Mueller, ¶ ¶ I have written to the station-holders in the far north west named in the enclosed list requesting their kind offices on behalf of Mr Bauerlen should he visit...

div.p: MRS 4/4/338-9 outward letters, Archives of Powerhouse Museum, Sydney.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
I have written to the station-holders in the far north west named in the enclosed list requesting their kind offices on behalf of Mr Bauerlen should he visit them in the course of his journeyings.
See M to J. Maiden, 6 May 1887, and J. Maiden to M, 11 May 1887 (in this edition as 87-05-11a).

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: I am as anxious as you are to make this trip a complete success, so please do not hesitate to let me know in what further ways I can be of help.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
p.seg: The Baron Ferd: von Mueller, K.C.M.G., F.R.S.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: [P]S I am indebted to my friend Mr Du Faur for the list of squatters.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Enclosure in letter to Baron Mueller dated 13 May 1887 .

cell.p:
J. & M
W? John and William Christian were the leaseholders. Christian

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: The numbers represent the holdings on the official maps
